experience.jobSummary: Leading product design and data visualization for the Revenue Cycle Insights application. The MVP release was designed for internal insights managers at Huron Healthcare. experience.jobSummary: Leading product design for the core SaaS platform; a 'full-stack' product for livestream retail and e-commerce.  The core application is used by over 5,000 entrepreneurs to scale their live-selling businesses; processing combined sales (GMV) of over $1.2bn annually.

linkedinSummary: I am a designer who is motivated by product strategy, UX practices, UI design, and front-end development. I am continually growing my knowledge, skills, and experience across these domains to bring value-driven design to eCommerce platforms and enterprise applications.

I believe collaboration is the key to success. I have lead front-end  design for multi-disciplinary teams of Systems Architects, Product Owners, Software Developers, QA testers, Commercial and Marketing specialists.
